TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowInstanceProxy extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A class that allows extensions access to the workflow service host.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginResumeBookmark (System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginResumeBookmark(class System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The data to be passed to the activity that created the bookmark.
The method to be called when the asynchronous resume operation has completed.
An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, callback method, and user-provided state data.
Docs.returns: A reference to the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To determine if the resume operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>. <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the callback method. If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginResumeBookmark (System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginResumeBookmark(class System.Activities.Bookmark bookmark, object value, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The data to be passed to the activity that created the bookmark.
The interval in which the resume operation must complete before the operation is canceled and a is thrown.
The method to be called when the resume operation has completed.
An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Resumes a workflow from a bookmark asynchronously using the specified bookmark, value, time-out interval, callback method, and user-provided state.
Docs.returns: A reference to the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To determine if the resume operation was successful, call <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>. <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> can be called from inside or outside of the callback method. If <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A> is called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation completes. By default, the resume operation must complete in 30 seconds or a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown from <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.EndResumeBookmark%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Activities.BookmarkResumptionResult EndResumeBookmark(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The that references the resume operation.
Docs.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method can be called to determine whether a <xref:System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceProxy.BeginResumeBookmark%2A> operation was successful. If called before the resume operation completes, it blocks until the resume operation is complete.
